text:
David Weisman (March 11, 1942 – October 9, 2019) was an American movie director, producer, author, and graphic artist. He was known for directing the movie "Ciao! Manhattan" and for producing "Kiss of the Spider Woman". Weisman was born in Binghamton, New York.
Weisman died on October 9, 2019 of problems caused by the West Nile virus at a Los Angeles hospital, aged 77.
